text: Kyberon Cloud: GridMaster™ Hardware Blueprint. Technical Specification & Deployment Guide (Internal Sales Only). 1. Executive Summary: 'The Power of the Machine'. GridMaster is the industry-standard for automated power balancing in hyper-scale data centers. 2. Architecture Overview. The GridMaster system operates at the PDU (Power Distribution Unit) layer, utilizing real-time sensors. Table 1: Grid Master V4 Hardware Specs.

sections.heading: 1. Executive Summary: 'The Power of the Machine'
sections.content: GridMaster acts as the central nervous system for physical rack management, preventing thermal runaway and power grid failure in high-density AI environments.

sections.heading: 2. Architecture Overview
sections.content: Operates at the PDU layer using real-time sensors to distribute electrical load with millisecond latency.
